org.coniks.coniks_server

Class TransparencyOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.TransparencyOps

  • public class TransparencyOps
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all transparency-related operations done by a CONIKS server. These allow a CONIKS client to perform the consistency checks.

    • Constructor Summary

      TransparencyOps()

    • Method Detail

      • generateSTR

        public static SignedTreeRoot generateSTR(RootNode root,
                         long ep,
                         long prevEp,
                         byte[] prevStrHash)
        Generates the STR from the root node root, the epoch ep, the previous epoch prevEp, and the previous STR's hash prevStrHash.
        Returns:
        The signed tree root, or null in case of an error.

      • generateNextSTR

        public static SignedTreeRoot generateNextSTR(RootNode root,
                             long ep)
        Generates the STR from the root node root for the epoch ep. Hashes the current STR, and computes the signature for the next STR.
        Returns:
        The signed tree root, or null in case of an error.

      • generateAuthPathProto

        public static C2SProtos.AuthPath generateAuthPathProto(UserLeafNode uln,
                                       RootNode root)
        Generates the authentication path protobuf message from the root node root to the user leaf node uln.
        Returns:
        The C2SProtos.AuthPath protobuf message or null upon failure.
